LanguageData.M4_SPiano.label: straight piano
LanguageData.M4_SPiano.description: also known as upright piano. This beautiful piece of craftmanship has been the companion of singers for centuries. Key instrument for classical music, blues, jazz and many more music styles.
LanguageData.M4_KaraokeMachine.label: karaoke machine
LanguageData.M4_KaraokeMachine.description: A screen and microphones to sing along on your favorite tunes. Not suitable for hospital patients.
